column4: anyone know why flash lags really bad on my computer with ubuntu but didnt with windows? any fixes?
they are different version/operating systems, they don't behave the same
it shouldnt make my computer completely lagged out though...
2.8ghz P4 Hyper Threaded 512mb ram and a 256mb geforce video card...
how much ram have you assigned to your vm's
that i have no clue, how would i check that?
VB is a windows application, mono is as close as it gets
my friend, who is using windows, sent me some programming he wants me to look at, will mono let me at least view it?
sorry, quick question, probably dumb, but do you think it would be possible to run visual basic off of wine?
lol better than a no, guess i'll give it a shot, thanks for your help though :)
